alert.note: Alert for Appling; Atkinson; Bacon; Coffee; Jeff Davis; Wayne (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 7:29PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT COFFEE...NORTHWESTERN ATKINSON... NORTHWESTERN BACON...NORTHWESTERN WAYNE...JEFF DAVIS AND APPLING COUNTIES THROUGH 815 PM EDT... At 729 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lyons to 6 miles south of Milan. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Douglas, Baxley, Hazlehurst, Broxton, Ambrose, Graham, Surrency, Plant Hatch, Nicholls, and Pridgen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Appling; Atkinson; Bacon; Coffee; Jeff Davis; Wayne
